dcterms:creator: Min Sun
Ali Farhadi
Steve Seitz
dcterms:description: YouTube Highlights is constructed by mining YouTube videos related to six specific categories - dog, parkour, gymnastics, skiing, skating, and surfing with about 100 videos in each category.
dcterms:title: YouTube Highlights

dcterms:creator: Yale Song
Jordi Vallmitjana
Amanda Stent
Alejandro Jaimes
dcterms:description: TVSum has 50 videos across 10 diverse categories such as changing vehicle tire, making sandwich, and so on.
dcterms:title: TVSum

dcterms:creator: Jie Lei
Tamara L Berg
Mohit Bansal
dcterms:description: QVHighlights is much larger than the other two datasets, with over 10,000 videos. It is primarily designed for query-focused video highlight detection and moment retrieval.
dcterms:title: QVHighlights
